about_the_game:
Features:

  • Functional Driving Mechanics: Mechanics put together by someone who didn't buy a car until 27 and pulled handling from Wikipedia. At least the car goes where you tell it... mostly.

  • Insane Tracks: From loop-de-loops to dodging tipped RVs, every course is a test of how well you can handle your ride and anticipate the chaotic crowd.

  • Rogue NPC Competitors: Your rivals race as if they're all trying to make it home from the bar before their wives wake up. Cars will be dented, walls will be scraped, there's a respawn mechanic for a reason.

  • A Series of Unlockable Cars: Collect a motley series of vehicles to race with, ranging from "Cars I wanted as a middle-schooler" to "The worst possible racer I can conceive of."

So buckle up (seriously, safety first) and get ready to race like you’ve never raced before.

name: Tire Fire Rally
short_description: Race through increasingly ridiculous and unsafe tracks as you fulfill your sponsor-inflicted contract at the Tire Fire Rally.
